author: jukka
msg: TIKA-543: Remove rome 1.0 dependency on java.net repository

author: sdeboy
msg: Added multi-select capability to event table and 'copy selection' context menu item (multi-select by holding down alt key while selecting rows)
New 'add to find field' context menu option
Simplified context menu (removed scroll to bottom/top, moved dock option to bottom)
Updated logic determining value for a specific cell
